item.title: Seminar: Era of Declarative UI
item.description: Gave a small talk at KotlinConf'19 Global - Dhaka about Declarative UI with Kotlin. Era of Declarative UI by sadman samee tonmoy on Scribd

item.title: Seminar: Kotlin - Why, How and When with Android

item.title: Seminar: Let's learn Kotlin
item.description: Gave a small presentation at University Seminar to show basics about Kotlin, how it’s very easy to learn and follow. Let's Learn Kotlin by sadman samee tonmoy on Scribd
